description.en_US: Connect to Supabase and run database queries, insert, update, upsert, delete, and RPC.
Connect to your Supabase project with URL and API key (anon or service role).

hint.en_US: Project URL from Supabase dashboard (e.g. https://xxxxx.supabase.co)

description.en_US: Run a SELECT query on a table or view with optional filters, order, and pagination.

hint.en_US: JSON: object for multiple eq (e.g. ï½›"id": 1ï½) or array for advanced ops, e.g. [ï½›"op":"eq","column":"id","value":1ï½,ï½›"op":"like","column":"name","value":"%a%"ï½]
Return query plan instead of data (requires db_plan_enabled)

description.en_US: Insert one or more rows into a table.

hint.en_US: JSON array of objects or single object

description.en_US: Update rows matching the given filters.

hint.en_US: JSON object of column names and new values
JSON object to target rows, e.g. ï½›"id": 1ï½

description.en_US: Insert or update rows (by primary key or conflict columns).

hint.en_US: JSON array or object; include primary key for upsert

description.en_US: Delete rows matching the given filters.

hint.en_US: JSON object to target rows to delete, e.g. ï½›"id": 1ï½

description.en_US: Call a Postgres function (RPC) with optional arguments.
Sign in with email and password.
Create a new user with email and password.
Sign out the current session (local or global).

hint.en_US: local = this client only; global = all clients

description.en_US: Get the current user (optionally validate a JWT). Prefer over get-session for security.

hint.en_US: Optional access token to validate; if empty uses current session

description.en_US: Get the current session from storage.
Send a password reset email to the given email.

hint.en_US: URL to redirect after password reset

description.en_US: Verify a one-time password (e.g. after magic link or OTP sign-in).

display_name.en_US: Supabase Auth: Get user claims from JWT

description.en_US: Decode and verify a JWT and return its claims (sub, email, role, etc.).

hint.en_US: JWT to verify; if empty uses current session.
If true, do not reject expired JWTs.
